text: qalt almlaykt: ya lut 'inna rusul rabik 'arsalana l'ihlak qwmk, wa'iinahum lan yasiluu 'ilyk, fakhruj min hadhih alqaryat 'ant wa'ahlak bbqyt min allyl, wala yaltafit minkum 'ahad wra'h; lialaa yaraa aleadhab fysybh, lknn amra'atak alty khantk bialkufr walnfaq sysybha ma 'asab qawmak min alhlak, 'iina maweid hlakhm alsbh, wahu maweid qarib alhlwl
